bug.author: bommo1
bug.summary: Cannot build OpenCV with Libtiff for iOS
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => latest commit on 3.4 branch Operating System / Platform => MacOS 10.14.3 Compiler => Apple clang 10.0.0.10001145 (xCode 10.1) CMake 3.13.4
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Cannot build LIB TIFF for iOS. (with BUILD_TIFF = OFF the build runs fine) <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
set BUILD_TIFF = ON in CMakeLists.txt run build_framework.py

Cannot copy output executable
Check folder access rights.

Grab "cmake" command and try to run it separately. Then add "--trace-expand" to debug it (output is large). Additionally you need to set IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET environment variable.
Similar to above, but with "--debug-trycompile". It should keep temporary directories with build logs.
